data.title: A noble act of compassion by Princess Maria Letizia of Aosta in the Basilica of Superga, Italy
meta_keywords: history;20th Century;Italy;Italian;church;Basilica Of Superga;basilica;interior;Superga;Duchess Of Aosta;princess;royalty;Maria Letizia Bonaparte;compassion;helping;funeral;priest;Cathloic;Christian;compasionate;collapsed;noble;act;E Abbo
data.meta_description: Download stock image of “A noble act of compassion by Princess Maria Letizia of Aosta in the Basilica of Superga, Italy. Un nobile atto di pieta della Principessa Laetit a d'Aosta nella Basilica di Superga. Illustration for La Tribuna Illustrata, 6–13 July 1913.” from the Look and Learn History Picture Archive
